src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : Do you need information ? [MASK] [end] RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( hot ( chocolate ) ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # inform ( food ) ; inform ( drink ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment . # acknowledge ( )

ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( doctor ( room ) ) @ AG ( LP , go-to ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . # acknowledge ( ) ; give-feedback ( positive ) @ CG ( LP , go-to ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? # r-repet ( ) ARI : Do you need information ? # offer-help ( )

src: [start] RP : We 'll walk slowly , it 's ok . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : Umm ... Where are the lifts ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lifts ) ) @ AG ( RP , go-to ( lifts ) ) RP : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) @ CG ( RP , go-to ( lifts ) ) RP : We 'll take the lift then , it 'll be easier .
tgt: RP : We 'll walk slowly , it 's ok . LC : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Umm ... Where are the lifts ? # request ( location ( lifts ) ) @ G ( RP , go-to ( lifts ) )

The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's nice of you to answer us . [MASK] RC : Thank you very much . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Thanks ARI . [MASK] LP : Maybe we could ask him if there 's anything to eat ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Yes , yes . [MASK] [MASK] RC : And also , could you show us to the cafeteria ? If there is one in the hospital . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] LP : How do we get there ARI ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LP : Do we have to take the lift ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : So you do n't know how to get to the cafeteria ? Because yesterday ... [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] LP : So it 's on the ground floor . RC : Yes , that 's it . [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Can you take us there by any chance ? ARI : I 'm sorry , I ca n't give you that information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . # cant-help ( ) ; call-nurse ( ) RC : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you ARI . # thank ( )

src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( name ( ari ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : I 'd like to have a little coffee before seeing the doctor . # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : Ah yes , that 's a good idea , so we 'll ... # acknowledge ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) LC : Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : Ok , perfect . # acknowledge ( ) @ CG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : We 'll be able to have a coffee or something else . Does that suit you ? @ AG ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) LC : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ CG ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : We 'll go slowly , we have time anyway . LC : Do you have to have coffee at the cafe ? [start] ARI : No . [MASK] LC : Ok. We 'll go straight to the counter . [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] RP : Let 's go then . LC : We 'll ask for coffee . LC : Yes , yes . [MASK] LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . LC : Are there many people waiting in radiology ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Ok , it 's clear . [MASK] RP : So maybe we 'll go through the reception area again ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes , ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : We 're going to ask him how to get there . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : Now I 'm a little bit lost , I do n't know which corridor we came from . [MASK] LC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : And which corridor to take to get to the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : I may have to go to the toilet before . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Where are the toilets , please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : I 'll let you go to the toilet , I 'll wait for you . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
tgt: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( lift ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lift ) ) @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )
tgt: RC : Ok , thank you . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? # request ( location ( cardiology_department ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cardiology_department ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information .
